An old, but still relevant and true education meme about #Bitcoin. What it's describing is the difficulty of hash collisions.  All the mining hashrate in Bitcoin's entire history can only bruteforce a 90-bit hash. If there were two "Bitcoin"s, that'd be 91 bits (not 180 bits).  https://t.co/dkb3knONic
